author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1666085198}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 393, 'last_played': 1685539576}
review:
Farm Frenzy: Heave Ho isn't really a proper game, it's just a lazy 2D browser/Flash-tier "number incrementer" game where the object of the game is to increase the in-game currency by clicking, and sometimes buying things that increase the rate at which your currency/score goes up.  It's an incredibly shallow game loop, to the point you might as well just run a program that does "i=i+1; print i" and watch the numbers go up automatically, and just watch it.  You'd get the exact same outcome.  If this sounds completely mindless, you're not wrong.  But there's some differentiation to the general incrementer theme here, as you're given levels and specific objectives to collect a certain number of things or click through a certain number of goals... but this is a very thin veneer over a very crappy game premise and a mediocre repetition of the old, dead theme. 

The game has a family friendly farm-meets-cutesy pirate theme to finish the look of that thin veneer, but this seems almost predatory if you ask me.  Games designed for children should have a little more to them than this shallow experience.

From a technical perspective, the game doesn't meet basic minimum requirements that most PC gamers expect as standard.

There's no options to change the resolution for the game or customise the graphics settings.  There's no way for gamers to ensure this is running at the native resolution of their displays... there's no guarantee this game will look right on any PC as a result of this hamfisted design decision.  There's no way for gamers to try improve the low quality graphics. 

The game features simple, cartoony 2D graphics, of the type you normally expect to see in low effort mobile apps.  3D graphics programming does require a degree of skill and competence and unfortunately not all developers have the budget or talent to deliver this, despite 3D graphics cards hitting the mainstream in the 1990's.  Considering this is being evaluated as a PC game, having the graphics phoned in like this isn't going to result in a high quality, visually impressive game that PC gamers are used to seeing.

The controls can't be customised because the game has such a dumbed down, simplified interface that it's just iPhone screen tapping stuff.  The fact that the interface is this dumbed down might be seen as a problem in itself, however... this is a fairly shallow experience if you're the kind of gamer that likes to play games with deep, rich control schemes and interaction.  You'll get none of that here.

This looks and feels like a mobile app, but it doesn't seem to have made it to the app stores.  It's unclear why this was put on Steam instead of the app stores it seems to have been designed for.  Maybe it was removed, maybe it was rejected by Apple and Google (they do have more rigorous quality standards than Valve does for Steam, after all).

Regardless, for all intents and purposes Farm Frenzy: Heave Ho might as well be a mobile app, it has the same limitations and dumbed down qualities.  It's impossible to recommend such a game to PC gamers.  We don't spend all this money building gaming rigs so we can pretend they're iPhones and play games that might as well be mobile apps.

These technical defects push this game below acceptable standards for any modern PC game.

Reviewing SteamDB to check how popular this game was with players reveals a surprise... there's a very healthy spike in player counts for the game.  But this only appears around the same time that trading cards were applied to the game... so this is just card idlers getting their cards and moving on.  A closer look at the numbers shows the game just has a couple of players every week running up the game and idling it for cards, then deleting it.  We must ask how it benefits gamers for there to be so many games like this, with no merit as a serious game, that only generate sales from people idling and selling the trading cards.

Farm Frenzy: Heave Ho has the laughable, eye-watering price of around $5 USD, it's not worth it given the defects and shortcomings with the product.  If this is the kind of game you really want to play, don't waste $5 on Steam, this kind of game can be had for free on mobile app stores.

author: {'steamid': '76561198201246082', 'num_games_owned': 3232, 'num_reviews': 1499, 'playtime_forever': 418, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 418, 'last_played': 1669488861}
review:
Çiftlik Çılgınlığı: Heave Ho, Farm Frenzy serisine eğlenceli ve heyecan verici bir ektir. Bu oyunda oyuncular, terk edilmiş bir adadaki hayvanların kendi geçimlerini sağlamayı öğrenmelerine yardımcı olan Scarlett'e rehberlik ediyor. Ekin yetiştirmekten mal üretmeye ve komşu adalarla ticaret yapmaya kadar tamamlanması gereken çeşitli görevlerle, oyuncular altın madalya kazanmak ve başarıların kilidini açmak için zamanlarını ve kaynaklarını iyi yönetmelidir.

Oyunun işaretle ve tıkla basitliği ve dokunmatik ekran uyumluluğu, her yaştan oyuncunun keyif almasını kolaylaştırıyor. Canlı animasyonlar ve renkli ada görselleri oyunun eğlenceli ve kaygısız atmosferine katkıda bulunuyor. Ayrıca, oyunun hikayesi vahşi ve kaçık hayvanlar ve baş belalarıyla doludur ve oyuncular için ilgi çekici ve eğlenceli bir deneyim sağlar.

Genel olarak, Farm Frenzy: Heave Ho, saatlerce oynanış ve kilidini açmak için çok sayıda madalya ve başarı sunan zorlu ve eğlenceli bir oyundur. Farm Frenzy serisinin ve sıradan simülasyon oyunlarının hayranları bu son oyundan kesinlikle keyif alacaklardır.

author: {'steamid': '76561198299183306', 'num_games_owned': 296, 'num_reviews': 208, 'playtime_forever': 408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 408, 'last_played': 1636207832}
review:
猴子低头啃草，产下了一根香蕉。
6/10
————————————————————
疯狂农场系列其实就是同一个游戏换换动物和产出物。
这一代的产业链是这样的：
鸡→蛋→蛋粉→面条→意大利面
猪→肉→肉排→火腿→汉堡
鹦鹉→羽毛→羽毛束→装饰物→帽子
猴子→香蕉→果汁→果酱→布丁

author: {'steamid': '76561198227783564', 'num_games_owned': 584, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1615668922}
review:
Para pasar el rato en cualquier, he dicho cualquier, computador que tengas.
El título lo dice todo, es un farm frenzy, esos juegos de la infancia que corrian hasta en la windows 98 destartalada que tu papá no quería soltar.
Juego básico de gestion de recursos con metas por tiempo de dificultad baja tirando para nula, lo único que requiere es pensar al inicio de cada nivel que te quedas, que vendes y por que objetivo arrancas para poder completar todo en tiempo y forma.
Este título en particular tiene ¿boosters? yas, ademas de el "dinero" para mejorar tus maquinas y acompañantes, trae boosters que podes conseguir por medio de una tragaperras que funciona con unos tokens especiales que te van dando a medida que completas logros in game (para cuando los añaden en steam los logros csm?) y al sacar la mejor puntuación de nivel (e incluso hay una opcion de comprar los token de booster en la tiendita de mejoras). Para mi es muy meh, no los vas a usar nunca a menos que no sepas jugar, estes aburrido y quieras acabar un nivel rápido o para el logro de utilizar 35 boosters.
En si es un juego entretenido para los casuals, niños y adultos que no se llevan muy bien con los juegos en general, o porque no tambien para los nostalgicos que de pequeños jugamos varios títulos de ésta serie de juegos tan estupidamente adictivos.
¿Cumple como farm frenzy? y si, es farm frenzy, dale nostalgico dale compralo, encima no vale ni 2 pe y tenes farm frenzy para rato. Le tiro unas 6-8 horas de juego si son los 90 niveles que leí en el apartado de logros in game ya que le estimo unas 2-3 horas cada 30 niveles (?)

El que se atreva a criticar los gráficos horriblemente hermosos de estos juegos, que diga fecha y lugar para agarrarnos a combos.

review:
Мой обзор будет 56-ым, всего лишь, а игра в магазине уже 5 лет... Я чего-то не понимаю? Это же прикольная игрушка, помню как играл в нее лет 10 назад, неужели так мало людей с ней знакомы?
И да, на компьютере сейчас я скорее всего не стану играть в подобное, но ведь это частичка приятных воспоминаний, которая была в обязательном порядке добавлена в мою библиотеку! Кстати, сейчас игра продается за 25 рублей, почему нет? Вперед! <3

review: this is a standard time management game; each level gives you a set of objectives like collecting a number of items and creating food dishes. You're only given so much time and money to purchase livestock and tend to your land, so you have to figure out a strategy on what to buy and sell and also keeping the animals out of the barnyard and picking up produce before it disappears. this can be challenging , especially if you're trying to get high score, but can also be relaxing if you're not worried about the score.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996890045', 'num_games_owned': 3060, 'num_reviews': 293, 'playtime_forever': 424, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 399, 'last_played': 1529223125}
review:
Farm Frenzy: Heave Ho is a good game for children.

The graphics are well-drawn, in a cute cartoon style.
The gameplay is easy to learn.

It's a time management game in which the player has to raise hens, collect eggs, make and sell produce, and stop some rascally animals from stealing the eggs.

It's all good clean fun for youngsters.

author: {'steamid': '76561198273114904', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 846, 'last_played': 1530880506}
review: 呃，买了解压怀旧的，但其实因为每一关都要刷金箱子也不是很解压……内核几代都一样，也就是换了美术。但我玩三代之前都没用过猫和狗，现在还是用不到狗，但猫是必须的，不知道是不是老了眼花了……另外主线故事就算了吧，和动物一起开农场，猴子吃草产香蕉都罢了，猪吃草时不时产肉真的细思恐极

author: {'steamid': '76561198241559318', 'num_games_owned': 297, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 4316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4222, 'last_played': 1518629504}
review:
Отчасти аркада, отчасти симулятор бизнеса, она объединяет некоторые элементы, такие, как: сбор урожая, проверка твоих рефлексов и реакции, (а так же надо не забывать получать про золото на каждом уровне;). 
Рекомендую поиграть, если хочется убить время.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135174818', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1529895482}
review:
Hab die ersten Teile früher sehr gerne gespielt, muss aber leider sagen, dass es viel von seinem Charme eingebüßt hat. 
Obwohl ich die Idee mit den Piraten noch ganz nett finde, ist es viel zu einfach. Für die 20 oder so Level die ich bisher gespielt hab, brauchte ich keine einzige Wiederholung. Außerdem sind einige Spielmechaniken die es "spannender" (wenn das bei so einem Spiel geht) gemacht haben weg, wie z.B. das Beschleunigen von Gebäuden, die wenn man nicht aufpasst explodieren oder dass die Bären, wenn man sie nicht ins Warenlager verstaut die Gebäude beim ausbrechen zerstören.

Alles in allem für die paar Cent (habs für 0,49€ im Sale gekauft) immer noch ein netter Zeitvertreib, das wars aber leider auch schon.

author: {'steamid': '76561198339748962', 'num_games_owned': 293, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1518752939}
review: Quero dizer que, os jogos da saga Farm Frenzy são bem nostalgicos para mim, ainda mais pq sempre gostei quando era criança. Para mim o game em si requer um pouco de estratégia e agilidade para conseguir alcançar os objetivos a tempo e receber um troféu de gold.

author: {'steamid': '76561198413884135', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 127, 'playtime_forever': 608, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 608, 'last_played': 1516117694}
review:
[b]Farm Frenzy franchise?[/b] Wow, that's old school. Since 2007! 

The original Farm Frenzy is a [i]top-rated classic farming game[/i]. Heave Ho? Sigh. Same goes with selected Hollywood movie franchises, they just go down hill one after another. Not worth watching anymore. 

[b]Selling Point?[/b] If you have never tried Farm Frenzy, this is probably a good game. It is a simple clicking game that does not require extensive finger-eye-brain coordination. If you are still a young kid and want to try the gaming world, this is a good start for you!

[b]Major Down Point?[/b] Steam achievement horders will not even be reading this review at the first place - because there are [u]NO Steam achievements[/u]. To me, this is really disappointing. There are achievements in the game, the developers could have done simple coding to link the in-game achievements to Steam. This will motivate many gamers! Sadly this only shows that the developers are not even bothered to put more effort in the game.

[b]Children Friendly[/b] - Yes, but not to a 3-year old. You need to be able to understand simple instructions and know what is the concept of "goal/target". Some young children cannot understand what they are supposed to achieve. So they just click around for fun (which I feel is a waste of money to buy this game for them because they learn nothing.)

[b]Language Barrier[/b] - Not really. You need to understand simple English to read the instructions. You can try to click around, but there might be certain components that you may miss out / cannot understand. 

[b]Time Commitment[/b] - Each level is about 2-5 minutes. It is a game you can play while waiting for someone / something. 

This is the summary:

[b]For You:[/b] 
1. Cannot handle complex game
2. Finding a "waiting" game
3. Just joined the gaming world 
4. Cannot handle "heavy" time managment game (You do not need to replay if you exceeded the time) 

[b]NOT For You[/b]:
1. Steam achievement horder
2. Want something different from Farm Frenzy

Graphics: 6/10
Repetitiveness Of Action: 7/10
Overall Enjoyability: 3/10

[b]Personal Conclusion:[/b] Blah. It is not my game. Not after trying Farm Frenzy. There are thousands of other games. If you have tried Farm Frenzy, please just skip this one. I am putting a positive review because....I want to be nice :) lol.

review:
Это просто отличное продолжение серии из самого детства.
Ваша мамаша играет в ферму на одноклассниках? - эта игра ей подойдёт,
Сына-корзина младший просит поиграть в кудахтер? - и ему она подойдёт,
Устал от онлайна или прошёл все синглы? - добро пожаловать!
Вот раньше-то игры умели делать...

author: {'steamid': '76561198137201199', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 768, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 768, 'last_played': 1474924609}
review: The neat thing about this version is that you use tokens to purchase boosters that help you beat the level. It makes those more challenging levels easier to get a gold chest on. I may even be able to beat the entire game with all gold chests. The story is a little lame, probably done in a hurry and not thought out well. They make hamburgers from ham. I'd call that a ham sandwich. Graphics are bright and cheerful. Overall, I still like the game.

review:
The game responds unreliably to mouse clicks: sometimes it takes one, sometimes two, for the game to think you've clicked on something. It's distracting, and frustrating if you care about level speed. 

If it weren't for that, it looks like it'd be a fun new Farm Frenzy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009070885', 'num_games_owned': 2372, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 1693, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 998, 'last_played': 1459089191}
review:
Отличная красочная игрушка, одна из лучших в серии Farm Frenzy!
Безупречная "убивалка" времени в которой 90 уровней, временами действительно приходится поломать голову как успеть их пройти на золото =)
Нашла незначительный минус только в отсутсвии режима бесконечной игры, который был в предыдущей части, а так 10/10 конечно, вполне стоит своих денег, игрушка сделана хорошо.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198041949592', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 605, 'playtime_forever': 506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 506, 'last_played': 1490536434}
review:
Hey everyone and this is my review about the game!

It's a relaxing Simulation game.


[h1] Interface/Menu/Settings.[/h1]

You can have multiple different profile slots.
There is a sound volume slidebar available.
There is a music volume slidebar available.
You can play this Fullscreen or Window mode, however there is no way to change the resolution size.

[h1]About the game[/h1]

You are on an crashed island with happy animals. You will have to be their dirty slave to make a farm for them. After you have grown a little farm and the animals are making production. You could click on this to store it into the warehouse. Whenever you need cash or the warehouse is getting too full, you could sell the items that are stored to get some gold to buy new animals or other things. Each level has a Gold-bronze cup and getting those gold cups will award you with bigger stars. Stars are needed to buy upgrades or buy new things in the shop. There are also awards/achievements ingame and completing those will grant you a coin/token which could be used in the slot machine to get boosters. Boosters could be used during a level to increase your chance of getting a gold cup. On higher levels wild happy animals will try to attack your farm and disrupt your plans. You can capture them, store them into the warehouse (which is taking alot of space) and then eventually sell them. Everytime something new comes in play, They will introduce the new thing and the pace will get slowed down. The pace will slowly increase up again.

Contains alot of levels.
There are ingame awards.
The game is well instructed.
Music is okay but has no variety... at all.
There is level selection available and you can simply replay the older levels again.
Graphics are okay.
There is a storyline.
Could be repetitive after awhile.
There is a time limit and if you complete it within a certain time limit. You will get a better reward.

[h1] Other things.[/h1]

This reminds me from one of many games on most gaming websites. (Like Flash games)
You can Re-do the levels that you have completed before to get some Stars again.
They are always so happy, having big smiles... It scares me..

An easy way to get money is from the Spaghetti machine. So Egg -> Egg machine -> Egg flour -> Spaghetti machine -> Sell it -> 100 Gold profit.  But why not Pasta? Well First you have to wait long, because it requires 3 steps to make it. Then u also need ketchup, which also will take time.. So if you sell those, you will only get 180 gold profit. Yes you get more.. But it takes longer. So in the long run, selling those spaghetti things will earn better.


I Give this a 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198168754339', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 3760, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1673, 'last_played': 1476356701}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198048574801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 1093, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1093, 'last_played': 1440716301}
review:
Farm Frenzy: Heave Ho is the sequel to Farm Frenzy: Hurricane Season and is a casual game from Buka Entertainment/Alawar. The game bears the Buka trademark cute childrens story book graphics. As is characteristic of nearly all games from this publisher the game is family friendly and well suited for younger children, but will appeal to casual game fans of all ages.

The graphics are full HD and are both cute and well animated. The artstyle is colourful and pleasing to look at.  The game has been given a pirate themed make-over this time with all the animals wearing pirate themed attire or sporting pirate themed tattoo's.

The sound is contextual with pleasant samples. Music is sequenced sound loops in a pseudo country style arangement which is pleasing to listen to. There appears to be a single in-game track repeated during game play stages which gets a bit repetitive. The repetition is broken to an extent by different tracks for the menu and pre-game instructions.

The player is tasked with purchasing chickens, collecting eggs, processing the eggs to make powder eggs, processing the powder eggs to make pasta and also accumulating funds. Storage facilities can be upgraded as can manufacturing facilities. Dogs can be hired to help capture ferrets and bears which can be sold at the market. Cats can be hired to collect goods and place them in storage.  As storage becomes full goods need to be transported to the market for sale.  There are additional facilities and more stages to complete than in earlier games in the series.

The style of play is arcade action with puzzle solving and resource management aspects. There are rewards for completing level completion criteria within certain time constraints.

The game is fun to play and it can be quite challenging completing stages within the required time.

The game size is small which should be a relief to those with limited storage capacity on their compter or laptop.

To summarise, a fun family friendly game with really cute graphics and good re-play value for those who like casual games.

7.9 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198003030375', 'num_games_owned': 3129, 'num_reviews': 773, 'playtime_forever': 513, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 513, 'last_played': 1440661085}
review:
Farm Frenzy: Heave Ho:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 

Relaxing on a small boat, Scarlett is enjoying the smooth and gentle rocking that occurs between each swell. When a storm hits suddenly, her boat capsizes and she finds herself stranded on a small island occupied by pirate animals…. What is going on here? 

As the friendly animals come to Scarlett’s rescue (well, that is what she thought) she quickly finds out that they are in need of a cracker of a farmer! 

Farm Frenzy: Heave Ho is the sequel to Farm Frenzy: Hurricane Season, and if you enjoyed the previous one you will definitely have a good time playing this game.

Essentially, you will have to complete all tasks per level within a specific time to achieve the golden chest. Upon your success you will receive a token which you can use in the slot machine to get well-needed booster which you will be able to use on the next level. Of course you will also gather money which will can be used to purchase upgrades. 

The pirate theme does give this game a plus and the cartoon style graphics are always fun. One thing I noticed is the levels are considerably more challenging than the previous title. In terms of the audio, not much change; I would personally prefer something a little bit exotic, Flamenco perhaps? 

In-game achievements but no Steam achievements, however you will still be getting trading cards.

Positives:
~~~~~~~  

-	Fun and challenging
-	Nice cartoon graphics
-	Value for money
-	Trading cards

Negatives:
~~~~~~~~~ 

-	No Steam achievements
-	Slightly repetitive

A fun management/strategy game for all ages. Great addition to have in your games library!  

8/10

Key provided by developer/publisher for review purposes. Any opinions expressed are entirely my own!

author: {'steamid': '76561198028216179', 'num_games_owned': 2423, 'num_reviews': 159, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1453399332}
review:
So much for a relaxing vacation!

Poor Scarlett has been dragged into more farming mayhem in this new addition to the Farm Frenzy series. After having a bit of misfortune during her trip, she ends up on an island where the local animals need her help with farming. It's a game filled with talking animals, making steaks and so much more.

It's a standard time management game, each level you're given a task and a certain amount of time to complete it. While you can take as long as you like, if you want gold or silver status you'll need to be quick about your work. You have different animals to tend to and different machines to re-purpose their goods. There is also a slot machine to gain boosters as well.

Two downsides to the game, though. It's a lot like the previous installment Hurricane season. While this is good because it means solid game play and great art, it also means the same music and a lot of the same machines and tasks. This can make things a bit repetitive so I would suggest playing it in bursts when you're in the mood to relax. The game also seems to lack Steam achievements but it does have Steam cards.

If you enjoy the series and want more farm antics then this good for you, or if you're new to the series and are looking for a relaxing casual game. It offers both a challenge and a good time

author: {'steamid': '76561197970329288', 'num_games_owned': 2788, 'num_reviews': 1451, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1440598961}
review:
A non-biased quick look @ the game:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sAyV7VNMGVU

Another relaxing fun resource management game with cookie clicker style elements. Scarlett is back in an all-new Farm Frenzy adventure that puts the fun back in farming! Guide the red-haired beauty as she sets aside her vacation plans to help the animals of an abandoned island learn to provide for themselves. With a few frenzied clicks of your mouse, grow crops, feed animals, and gather produce as you race against the clock to complete your goals. In time, you'll work your way up from caring for a few chickens to manufacturing goods and engaging in commerce with neighboring islands. 

Manage your time and resources well, and you'll earn a multitude of gold medals and unlock awesome achievements. As the story of the wild and wacky animals of the island and the troublemakers among their ranks unfolds, you'll be treated to colorful island visuals, vibrant animation, and the authentic sounds of a farming paradise! Don't miss the fun and the challenge of this exciting, no-holds barred chapter in the smash hit Farm Frenzy saga! - Recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198035054806', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 201, 'playtime_forever': 490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 490, 'last_played': 1440759708}
review:
Copy given for Review

Ok this time your farm is in on a Pirate island...  That's right, it's Farm Frenzy with cute pirate stuff.

Just like all the Farm Frenzy games. 
You pick up stuffs from your animals, take them to your factories, and then sell the what was made. Easy right?

These are calm fun games that can get on your nerves as they get harder and faster.

Cons:
This one still has the slot for bonus, but they changes the sounds and it's a tad anoying now. 
The stickers are gone, which were nice.

Pros:
A good fun game.
Cute creatures.
I enjoy the pirate stuff. 

Good for any age. Worth picking up!

author: {'steamid': '76561198050609845', 'num_games_owned': 5897, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 399, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 399, 'last_played': 1440611722}
review:
Back in action from Alawar Entertainment, are the Frenzied Farmfolk and of course Scarlett in Farm Frenzy: Heave Ho.   

**I was given this title for review purposes**

Graphics + Sound

The Graphics are the same as we have come to expect from The Farm Frenzy Series.  Flash Style Critters animate nicely.  Good Sound Effects that have been in the other games.  Nothing to write home about music.   6/10

Gameplay

This plays exactly like any other Farm Frenzy Title.  The formula is the same.  You are tasked with growing a Farm from the ground up and exporting your goods accordingly.   Except this time you're trapped on an island.  Alawar Entertainment needs to step it up and add something new to the series to get it going again.  The same old routine just doesn’t hack it anymore for this guy.  However it is still a fun little title to pass your time.  And if pirates are your thing and you love casual games this is the title for you.  6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197999732661', 'num_games_owned': 1755, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 459, 'last_played': 1440693779}
review:
Farm Frenzy: Heave Ho is next in the series of the very popular time management game series, and it maintains the same standard of quality of its predecessors.  If anything, it may be a little too similar to the previous entry with few gameplay changes, although if you enjoyed Hurricane Season, this one will certainly appeal to you.

The game is your standard genre fair; each level gives you a set of objectives in the area of collecting a number of items and creating food dishes. You're only given so much time and money to purchase livestock and tend to your land, so figuring out a strategy on what to buy and sell while keeping critters out of the barnyard and picking up produce before it disappears is the gist of the gameplay. Things can get hectic, especially if you're trying for gold, but can be rather laid back if you're not worried about challenging yourself.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=506817570
As you complete levels, you'll earn stars (in-game currency) that can be used to upgrade your farm equipment which will then churn out more product or give more storage space. You can also level up your trusty companions to better help fend off pesky intruders, and even buy tokens to use on the slot machine, making an overabundance of currency actually useful.  Completing in-game achievements also awards slot machine tokens which can be used to win more tokens, stars, and power-ups useable in the game levels. The power-ups aren’t required, but are beneficial if you’re aiming for gold trophies.

All of the artwork has a cartoony aesthetic to it that compliments the casual game play elements quite well. This is clearly the same artist as the previous game; all the characters look the same save for wearing pirate-ey apparel, but it’s pleasant on the eyes and fits the overall humor of the game. 

Once again, the absence of Steam Achievements is a sore spot.  At least the in-game achievements award tokens which are much more valuable now since they are no longer awarded from gold trophies.   But full Steam integration is a must for casual games, as it adds so much value to the overall package.  Trading cards are indeed nice, but not enough.

That said, Heave Ho is another great casual title, especially if you're looking for lighter fair to relax with in-between more serious gaming sessions. Despite my misgivings with the lack of Steam integration, it’s still a solid time management game that will appeal to those who enjoy the genre. 
   
Bottom Line: Recommended for those looking for a relaxing casual title with lots of polish and character.
